entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 5:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -21.9°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
